fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, give up to five people Jester Tokens.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When someone receives a Jester Token, they can choose to use it anytime during the day. When used, something random will happen at host discretion. The person will know what happens to them.
- You are Astral.
- You cannot give yourself a Jester Token.
- You will receive a random win condition at the start of the game. You will not know who your teammates are, and they won't know who you are. Good effects are twice as likely to happen to those aligned with you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win with whatever faction you are chosen to win with.
